choices-plus.settings.alwaysontop.title: Always on top
choices-plus.settings.alwaysontop.hint: If enabled, the choice will be on top of all other UI elements
choices-plus.settings.timerSize.title: Timer size
choices-plus.settings.timerSize.hint: Set the size of the timer on the choice dialog
choices-plus.settings.pickcolor.label: Pick color
choices-plus.settings.textcolor.title: Text color
choices-plus.settings.buttoncolor.title: Button color
choices-plus.settings.buttonhovercolor.h: The color of the buttons when hovered
The color of the buttons when selected
choices-plus.settings.reset.title: Reset settings to default
choices-plus.settings.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
choices-plus.settings.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
choices-plus.settings.debug.title: Enable debugging
choices-plus.settings.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
choices-plus.settings.enableIntegrationW: Use the module 'Forien's Easy Polls' for manage the democratic option ont he choice
choices-plus.dialogs.resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
choices-plus.dialogs.resetsettings.conte: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
choices-plus.dialogs.nosystemfound.title: System Not Recognized
choices-plus.dialogs.nosystemfound.conte:
This system is not currently fully supported. This means that the module does not know how to best handle this system's items, but can still operate in a limited fashion.

You can configure the module's settings yourself, but it requires a bit of technical know-how.

If you have any questions, ping Wasp#2005 on the Foundry discord.
choices-plus.dialogs.systemfound.title: System Recognized
choices-plus.dialogs.systemfound.content:
This system was previously not supported, but in an recent update it was added as a supported system!

Do you want to load this system's default Item Pile settings?
